title: Great Lakes: Highway to commerce
creator_credit: Clifford J. Kamen and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Depicts the importance of the Great Lakes to the early settlements of America and to the industrial development of regions adjacent to them, Illustrates the role of the Lakes in transporting lumber, wheat, coal, and iron ore; and pictures typical fright carrying vessels. Emphasizes the significance of the Lakes to the prosperity of America and to the well being of her people.
